task_summary: Robotic arm pours the contents from a cup into a mug by approaching, aligning, performing the pour with an appropriate tilt, and then retreating.

task_long_description.overview: The task is to pour the contents of a handled cup into a mug placed on a table using a robotic arm. The robot first locates the mug, moves above and aligns its end effector, then tilts the cup to pour into the mug with a determined angle and pour rate, and finally retreats once pouring is complete. The tabletop workspace is clear except for the objects involved.
preconditions: Cup is grasped by the robot
Mug is on the table, upright and within reachable area
No obstacles obstruct access to the mug opening
stepwise_plan: Check for visibility of target mug; detect if not visible
Move above the mug to a safe Z offset
Approach and align precisely over the mug
Pour from cup into mug using sufficient tilt
Retreat to avoid spilling or collision
success_criteria: Cup successfully tilts and contents flow into mug
No major spill detected outside mug
Robot returns to a safe pose post-pour
failure_and_recovery: Pour incomplete: reattempt pour within time constraints
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when pour action and retreat complete, or upon unrecoverable detection/alignment failure.

frame_3.now_evidence: Cup is above and aligned to mug; ready for pouring.
frame_3.predicts_next: Pouring expected to begin in subsequent frame.

node_specs.description: Check if mug is visible to robot.
Detect mug's location if not already visible.
Move above the detected mug to a safe height.
Precisely align the end effector over the mug.
Pour contents from cup into mug.
Retract arm from mug to a safe distance after pouring.

recovery_strategy: Retry mug detection if IsObjectVisible fails
assumptions: Frame sequence suggests cup is grasped at start (not part of this BT); only mug is target and pour is from a cup.
Exact amount, tilt, and pour rate chosen from sensible defaults since not specified in instruction or library.

expected_success_criteria: Cup contents enter mug with minimal spillage
Cup is above the mug at appropriate distance during pour
